Class PrescriptionItemController

java.lang.Object
control.prescription.PrescriptionItemController
public class PrescriptionItemController extends Object
Controller for handling operations related to prescription items.

  • Method Details

    • createPrescriptionItem

      public static PrescriptionItem createPrescriptionItem(String prescriptionId, String medicineId, int quantity, String notes) throws InvalidInputException
      Creates a new PrescriptionItem.
      Parameters:
      prescriptionId - The ID of the prescription.
      medicineId - The ID of the medicine.
      quantity - The quantity of the medicine.
      notes - Notes for the prescription item.
      Returns:
      The created PrescriptionItem.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If any input is invalid.

    • getPrescriptionItemById

      public static PrescriptionItem getPrescriptionItemById(String itemId) throws EntityNotFoundException, InvalidInputException
      Retrieves a PrescriptionItem by its ID.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the prescription item.
      Returns:
      The PrescriptionItem.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If the item is not found.
      InvalidInputException - If the item ID is invalid.

    • getPrescriptionItems

      public static List<PrescriptionItem> getPrescriptionItems(Prescription prescription) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves a list of PrescriptionItems for the given prescription.
      Parameters:
      prescription - The prescription to get items for.
      Returns:
      A list of PrescriptionItems.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the prescription is null.

    • dispensePrescriptionItem

      public static Boolean dispensePrescriptionItem(PrescriptionItem item) throws InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      Dispenses a PrescriptionItem and updates the medicine stock.
      Parameters:
      item - The PrescriptionItem to dispense.
      Returns:
      True if the item was successfully dispensed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the item is null.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the medicine is not found.

    • getPendingPrescriptionItems

      public static List<PrescriptionItem> getPendingPrescriptionItems(String prescriptionId) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves all pending PrescriptionItems for a given prescription ID.
      Parameters:
      prescriptionId - The ID of the prescription.
      Returns:
      A list of pending PrescriptionItems.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the prescription ID is invalid.

    • deletePrescriptionItem

      public static void deletePrescriptionItem(PrescriptionItem item) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Deletes a PrescriptionItem.
      Parameters:
      item - The PrescriptionItem to delete.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If the item is not found.

    • updatePrescriptionItem

      public static void updatePrescriptionItem(String prescriptionId, String medicineId, int quantity, String notes) throws EntityNotFoundException, InvalidInputException
      Updates an existing PrescriptionItem with new quantity and notes.
      Parameters:
      prescriptionId - The ID of the prescription.
      medicineId - The ID of the medicine in the prescription item.
      quantity - The new quantity of the medicine.
      notes - The updated notes for the prescription item.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If the PrescriptionItem is not found.
      InvalidInputException - If the inputs are invalid.
